bibl.title: Roman Military Clothing Requisitions in Egypt.
bibl.note: Diss. Columbia Univ. Summary in DA 52 (1991-1992) p. 648-A. - Edition of P. Col. Inv. 544. Record of payments made for the vestis militaris, the clothing tax. Hermopolite nome, 324-327.
SHERIDAN Jennifer Ann, Roman Military Clothing Requisitions in Egypt.
